New Records: Willy Adames tied the major league record with his 13th three-run homer of the season, going deep on his 29th birthday to lift the NL Central-leading Brewers over the Cardinals 9-3 on Sunday.
Key Match Events: Adames homered to left (371 feet), Chourio scored and Bauers scored in the first inning.
Pages homered to center (415 feet) in the third inning.
Hoskins homered to left (384 feet), Mitchell scored in the fourth inning.
Pages homered to left (375 feet) in the fifth inning.
Baker hit a sacrifice fly to center, Donovan scored in the sixth inning.
Chourio homered to left center (420 feet), Hoskins scored, Frelick scored and Ortiz scored in the sixth inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game took place at American Family Field in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, with an attendance of 41,731.
Umpires for the game included Alfonso Marquez, Lance Barrett, Jeremy Riggs, and Mark Ripperger.
